attributes.action: English Football League (EFL) Must Tackle Failing Clubs
attributes.additional_details: Please see http://blackpoolsupporterstrust.com/Site/LatestNews.aspx?NewId=117 for the full background information
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, believe that in the governance of its Member clubs, the English Football League is unfit for purpose. We urge it to adopt the case review model designed by the Blackpool Supporters Trust as a method for addressing failure.
